title: Goa Panchayat Orders Removal of Illegal Shivaji Statue but Backtracks After Violent Protests
selftext: The Calangute panchayat ordered the removal of an illegally installed Shivaji statue at a local crossroads, but retracted it and apologised for it following violent protests on Tuesday, June 20.
comments: The panchayat passed an order to demolish an illegal structure, but backtracked when the mob, who knew it was illegal, made it a religious issue.
